entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:26 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -40.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 06:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -40.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa steady
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -44.9°C
Wind: NNE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing this afternoon. Blowing snow at times late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning. High minus 34. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
